algorithm_technique: Work backward from target, prioritizing division by 2 when possible.
problem_summary_simple: Reach a target score from 1 using increments and at most k doublings, minimizing moves.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy approach working backward from target. Prioritize doubling if maxDoubles > 0 and target is even.
key_insights: The problem can be solved greedily by working backward from the target.
If maxDoubles is available and the target is even, dividing by 2 is always optimal.
If the target is odd, an increment is necessary before a potential division.
